pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inbreeding and Numerator Relationship Coefficients // Compute inbreeding coefficients using the method of Meuwissen and Luo (1992) doi:10.1186/1297-9686-24-4-305, and numerator relationship coefficients between individuals using the method of Van Vleck (2007) https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18050089/.
